caption: Jonas discovered that the person in the spaceship was from the citadel and decided to kill him. Vesper rushed forward to stop him, but her strength was too weak. She was controlled by Jonas and unable to move. In the end, she could only watch as Camellia's father was killed. After arriving home, Camellia asked about her father, Vesper answered that she had not found him. Camellia had no doubts and decided to search with Vesper the next day. Due to Vesper's treatment, Camellia's injury had healed quickly and she was able to walk on her own. Camellia exclaimed about Vesper's advanced biotechnology, and Vesper decided to take her to see her research results.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story or something else like science fiction movie or magical stories?)

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at night and at day time.
